name: Timor: Prologue
description:
Timor - a serial killer. But he never committed murder. How can this be?

Dreams - is his real enemy. Raised in a normal family, he got sleeping problems. Thoose dreams made him end up in mental hospital. Through this game series you will find out what really happened, and what made him be a person, who is the scariest human being alive.

This game was made for My First Game Jam: Summer 2020
